refnamediv.refpurpose: Check whether array contains more entries

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function checks if the array contains any more entries.

example.title: ArrayIterator::valid example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$array = array('1' => 'one');

$arrayobject = new ArrayObject($array);
$iterator = $arrayobject->getIterator();

var_dump($iterator->valid()); //bool(true)

$iterator->next(); // advance to the next item

//bool(false) because there is only one array element
var_dump($iterator->valid());
?>
